channel.title: Projects on Cloudware
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Cloudware

item.title: Docker In-Depth
item.description: Setup Ubuntu 18.04 Docker version 18.09.7, build 2d0083d containerd 1.2.6-0ubuntu1~18.04.2 runc version spec: 1.0.1-dev kervenl version: 5.3.0-61-generic Introduction Internals There are no such things as containers, Docker is only leveraging kernel feature called a namespace through different programs to give the illusion of container construct. Each namespace isolates a different dimension of the container and can be shared to other containers. Namespaces There are 5 namespaces involved in the container creation process

item.title: Reverse Engineering Android Applications and Threat Intelligence
item.description: Introduction This was my graduate thesis, in which I reversed engineered and android APK application, to then use a metasploit payload to launch malware from the infected app and then proceeded to attempt anti virus evasion. I go through the android permission model, applicaiton settings and how app signing works. An overview of ARM architecture, to move on to a list of tools I used to reverse engineer, including Metasploit and APKTool.
